overview: Bodacious beauties from another era, dance, gyrate, titillate and educate (especially viewers who have any doubts about the appearance of a beautiful naked female body) in this collection of rare stag films.  A barrel, a phone, and barbed wire take on new erotic meaning in these fascinating short subjects which prove, once again, that the female body is a timeless work of art.
tagline: Where The Heavenly Bodies Come Out At Night!
title: Sunset Strip: Volume 2
